channel.title: The sendkeys function for F keys?
channel.description: well how do you get it to send F1 F2 F3 and so forth, I need them for a mini-macro Idea at home >_>. If knowone knows can you atleast tell me how to hold shift and then a key?

item.title: The sendkeys function for F keys?
item.dc:creator: @Westside_Rep Westside Rep
item.description:
@Westside_Rep wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:2, topic:17254”][scar]
begin
SendKeysVB(’{F1}’, true);
end.
[/scar]
Change the 1 after F to whatever F key you want pressed.

for shift then a key:

[scar]
begin
SendKeysVB(’+’ + ‘a’, true);
end.
[/scar]
The plus represents shift, change ‘a’ to whatever you want pressed with shift.[/quote]

OMFG YOU ARE AWESOME!!! sorry for all caps… this is the first time i have been on this site in a very long time BUT THANK YOU SO MUCH!!! This will make my life a lot easier!!

Read full topic
item.source: The sendkeys function for F keys?

item.title: The sendkeys function for F keys?
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

You mean something like this?

[scar]
Until(Isfkeydown(9));
[/scar]

or something like that right?

item.title: The sendkeys function for F keys?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[scar]
begin
SendKeysVB(’{F1}’, true);
end.
[/scar]
Change the 1 after F to whatever F key you want pressed.

for shift then a key:

[scar]
begin
SendKeysVB(’+’ + ‘a’, true);
end.
[/scar]
The plus represents shift, change ‘a’ to whatever you want pressed with shift.
